channel.title: Adding NPC drops and others
channel.description: How can I make the King Black Dragon drop dragon armor and also is there a way to fix the lever, or a way to spawn an npc? Also what files do I have to edit to change fletching experience?

item.title: Adding NPC drops and others
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:10, topic:277919”]Drops are edited in NpcDef.xml, not NpcDef.java

Compress, not compile.

[edit] Also, make sure you’ve edited it client side too, in the NPCs.rscd file.[/quote]oops my bad i accidently typed NPCdef.java lol idk why

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC drops and others
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Drops are edited in NpcDef.xml, not NpcDef.java

Compress, not compile.

[edit] Also, make sure you’ve edited it client side too, in the NPCs.rscd file.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC drops and others
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“EmuX, post:8, topic:277919”]Adding drops and npc location did not work, got compile errors. It didn’t look right at all int the folder, you sent me xml format and its in java?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2009, 02:16:10 pm[/size][hr]Oh shit, think I know why. I added it to npcdef.java rofl.[/quote]drops are supossed to be edited in NPCDef.xml and npc locations in NPCLoc.xml u just 7-zip open archive edit then save and then press ok when a lil box comes up on the archive then compile and it should work

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC drops and others
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

EmuX:

How can I make the King Black Dragon drop dragon armor and also is there a way to fix the lever, or a way to spawn an npc? Also what files do I have to edit to change fletching experience?

And as for the levers and fletching experience, take a look at the: ObjectTelePoints.xml, ItemLogCutDef.xml and ItemBowStringDef.xml

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC drops and others
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“EmuX, post:5, topic:277919”]I just add that anywhere into the NPCdef?[/quote]yes but i suggest u not copy and paste just edit ur own king black dragon in the notepad, see how it says and all that good stuff just read that out. item 593 = d med to check other ids look in server - doc - item.java

If u wanted to place a chicken in edge bank it would look like this <NPCLoc> <id>3</id> <startX>216</startX> <startY>452</startY> <minX>216</minX> <maxX>216</maxX> <minY>452</minY> <maxY>452</maxY> </NPCLoc>

Read full topic

I just add that anywhere into the NPCdef?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC drops and others
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“EmuX, post:3, topic:277919”]Could you give me an example of what I need to edit?[/quote]if u wanted a kbd to drop a d med n d bones it would look like this <NPCDef> <name>King Black Dragon</name> <description>The biggest meanest dragon around</description> <command></command> <attack>255</attack> <strength>255</strength> <hits>600</hits> <defense>200</defense> <attackable>true</attackable> <aggressive>true</aggressive> <respawnTime>120</respawnTime> <sprites> <int>165</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> </sprites> <hairColour>0</hairColour> <topColour>0</topColour> <bottomColour>0</bottomColour> <skinColour>0</skinColour> <camera1>542</camera1> <camera2>391</camera2> <walkModel>10</walkModel> <combatModel>7</combatModel> <combatSprite>84</combatSprite> <drops> <ItemDropDef> <id>814</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>0</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>593</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>1</weight> </ItemDropDef> </drops> </NPCDef>

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC drops and others
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“EmuX, post:1, topic:277919”]How can I make the King Black Dragon drop dragon armor and also is there a way to fix the lever, or a way to spawn an npc? Also what files do I have to edit to change fletching experience?[/quote]To make a npc drop a certain item that would be found in NPCDef.xml and to place and npc somewhere that would be found in NPCLoc.xml

Read full topic
